body.head: Chapter 25: The Triumph of Chronius
body.p: And we also saw another brother among the monks whose name was Chronius, and he had arrived at a good old age, and was one of the first men who were contemporaneous with Abb√¢ Anthony; he was about one hundred and ten years of age, and he comforted us greatly and admonished us by his humility, which he had preserved even in his old age.
Here endeth the Triumph of Chronius
